channel.title: Time Series on Edward Chavis's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Time Series on Edward Chavis's blog

item.title: Time series
item.description: library(sqldf) library(Lahman) library(devtools) library(ggplot2) #extracting the data--------------------------------------- query<-"SELECT yearID,HR FROM Batting WHERE playerID='ruthba01'" result<-sqldf(query) #visualizing the data--------------------------------------- ggplot()+ geom_line(data=result,aes(x=yearID, y=HR))+ geom_point(data=result,aes(x=yearID, y=HR))+ ggtitle("Ruth's Homerun Totals Through the Years")+ xlab("year")+ ylab("homeruns")
